preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 8 g of barium using a precision scale. 
 2. Measure 2 g of erbium. 
 3. Measure 1 g of magnesium. 
 4. Measure 10 g of ruthenium. 
 5. Measure 1 g of scandium. 
 6. Combine all measured materials in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 7. Mix thoroughly using a mechanical mixer for 10 minutes to ensure a uniform blend.
